title: Hailey Bieber Does Effortless Style Better Than Anyone—Get Her Look With These 14 Outfits
description: These are more wearable than you might expect...
excerpt: These are more wearable than you might expect...
text: I keep a close eye on celebrities—for the sake of my job, of course. Anytime an A-lister steps out, it comes across my desk, no matter if it’s Kendall Jenner going to Pilates or Meghan Markle attending a gala. I consider Hailey Bieber to be a particularly chic style icon, so on the occasion that she gets snapped by the paparazzi, I just know a fantastic outfit awaits. It was no different when she and her husband, Justin Bieber, were seen in Los Angeles earlier this week. I knew I needed to copy the transitional ensemble ASAP. And out of the goodness of my heart, I figured I might as well share some of my findings with you, too. Below, shop Hailey’s most recent look, plus 13 of her other best outfits of all time. Neutral Perfection DUTCH/Bauer-GriffinChanging seasons are no match for Mrs. Bieber, clearly. She exemplified timeless capsule dressing in this ensemble just earlier this week. COS Striped Boatneck Top Now 25% OffBanana Republic Crop Flare Everywhere Ponte PantANINE BING Randy Oversized Trench CoatSteve Madden Lita Chocolate BrownRachpoot/Bauer-GriffinDid Hailey predict the brown trend when she sported this Saint Laurent getup to Paris Fashion Week in 2023? She might be further ahead of the trends than we even know. Saint Laurent Décolleté DressSaint Laurent Dune Slingback Pump Calzedonia 40 Denier Action TightsRing Concierge Flat Diamond Cut Curb Chain AnkletLong & Short thecelebrityfinder/Bauer-GriffinIn recent seasons, high fashion designers have had a lot of fun playing with proportions and silhouettes. “Big top, little pants; or big pants, little top,” as the TikTok saying goes. Boy shorts and giant faux fur coat? Why not. Cutoffs and a trench? Let’s do it. The Frankie Shop Astoria Cutout Trench CoatLeset Kelly Crop Slip Fit Agolde Indra Distressed Denim Shorts COS Classic Leather Belt Resort Ready Rachpoot/Bauer-GriffinTruthfully, I’m not sure if the world has ever been the same since Hailey, Kendall Jenner, and Gigi Hadid stepped out in their best vacationwear for a girls’ night a few summers ago. Although her bold spotted dress isn’t available, you can still channel the same vibe with this beaded-strap dress from Staud. BaubleBar Bubble Initial NecklaceAsta Resort Gisele Mini DressBottega Veneta The Pouch Leather Clutch Dolce Vita Brevel Kitten Heel Flip FlopPolo and Leather thecelebrityfinder/Bauer-GriffinIn another layered outfit that’s perfect for spring weather, Hailey toyed with two of the hottest current trends: polos and leather bombers. I love trend stacking! Not pictured here is the adorable Miu Miu top handle that completed the look. Guest in Residence Collegiate Stripe Polo RE/DONE ]Loose Long JeansNow 25% OffBanana Republic Oversized Leather Bomber Madewell The Dimes Kitten-Heel BootUniform Chic GothamRaise your hand if you wore a uniform to school. The implicit ease of a dress code is something you can only really understand if you’ve lived it. Now that I’ve graduated from the classroom to the office, I know that finding a basic outfit equation that works for you is the biggest game-changer come Monday morning. Aritzia Plush Cashmere Oversized V-Neck SweaterAritzia Olive Mini Skirt Tory Burch Classic Lug LoaferMango Handmade Oversized Wool Coat Now 35% OffSequin GlamMEGAAnd here we have the dress that launched 1,000 dupes. Although the exact 16Arlington dress she wore is no longer available, Reformation has a very cute mini dress with a strikingly similar look. I have this frock in my closet and my favorite part is the open back, obviously.Reformation Sereia Dress Larroudé Vivi Lucite Hi MuleNow 50% OffNood Starter KitUncommon James Vintage Rings, Set of 5 Simply Strapless Frazer HarrisonAnother day, another Saint Laurent look from Hailey. This one is so understated and minimal that it allows her natural beauty to take center stage. Sometimes, less really is more. Lana Blake Lariat NecklaceNorma Kamali Bias Strapless GownSkims Strapless Shortie BodysuitRaye Kamala Heel Jeans and Adidas Rachpoot/Bauer-GriffinStars are just like us; they live in jeans and sneakers, too. Snag her exact Levi’s from Amazon, or substitute with your favorite pair. Eterne Short Sleeve Baby TeeCitizens of Humanity Winslow Mid-Rise Straight JeansAdidas Samba OG The Garment Brooklyn Jacket Asymmetric Silk GothamThis Phoebe Philo dress belongs in a museum. Sadly, it’s not available for purchase right now, but I adore the Courrèges alternative below, regardless of whether you’re expecting. This exclusive dress from Bloomingdale’s is another great option with a billowing A-line cut that clocks in under $350. Courrèges Scarf-Neck Satin Mini DressKhaite Eva Leather PumpsSaint Laurent Shade Oval Sunglasses Dior Mini Lady Dior BagBare Legs & Boots thecelebrityfinder/Bauer-GriffinProportions are a theme with Hailey; did you notice? She once again opts for a substantial layer up top while showing some skin on her lower half. If my legs were that endless, I would probably do the same thing. Favorite Daughter The Cropped Charles Trench Coat Now 25% OffFleur du Mal Le Stretch Multi Fit Micro Bike ShortsPrada Leather BootsCOS Cavatelli Clutch Bag Sweat Set Bellocqimages/Bauer-GriffinFind me in the airport wearing this exact ensemble for my next flight. I think the accessories are what make this look. Without the Mary Janes, socks, glasses, hat, and earrings, this look is iffy at best. But with them? Effortlessly cool. Sporty & Rich Emblem Printed Crewneck Sporty & Rich Plaza Disco ShortsLe Monde Béryl Black Mary Jane Ballerina FlatsBoss Cattina Wool Blend CoatOpen BackCindy Ord/MG22For those playing along at home, can you guess who she’s wearing? Why, it’s Saint Laurent, of course. I understand you might lack red carpet opportunities, but there are still style lessons to be learned here. For one, don’t underestimate subtlety. We’ve all seen hundreds of silky champagne-colored dresses, but key elements like the open back and fun trim transform the look.Rat & Boa Lorela Dress Manito Diva Feather Trimmed Long RobeCommando The Essential Sheer TightsDorsey Gwen Lab White Sapphire Drop Earrings Cool Leather Stephane CardinaleThis is the third outfit in which Hailey wore a leather bomber, so I’m concluding that the outerwear style is one of her go-to’s. As she’s shown us, a classic black one works just as well with jeans as it does with an LBD. html:
I keep a close eye on celebrities—for the sake of my job, of course. Anytime an A-lister steps out, it comes across my desk, no matter if it’s Kendall Jenner going to Pilates or Meghan Markle attending a gala. I consider Hailey Bieber to be a particularly chic style icon, so on the occasion that she gets snapped by the paparazzi, I just know a fantastic outfit awaits. It was no different when she and her husband, Justin Bieber, were seen in Los Angeles earlier this week.

I knew I needed to copy the transitional ensemble ASAP. And out of the goodness of my heart, I figured I might as well share some of my findings with you, too. Below, shop Hailey’s most recent look, plus 13 of her other best outfits of all time.

Neutral Perfection

Changing seasons are no match for Mrs. Bieber, clearly. She exemplified timeless capsule dressing in this ensemble just earlier this week.

COS Striped Boatneck Top

Now 25% Off

Banana Republic Crop Flare Everywhere Ponte Pant

ANINE BING Randy Oversized Trench Coat

Steve Madden Lita

Chocolate Brown

Did Hailey predict the brown trend when she sported this Saint Laurent getup to Paris Fashion Week in 2023? She might be further ahead of the trends than we even know.

Saint Laurent Décolleté Dress

Saint Laurent Dune Slingback Pump

Calzedonia 40 Denier Action Tights

Ring Concierge Flat Diamond Cut Curb Chain Anklet

Long & Short

In recent seasons, high fashion designers have had a lot of fun playing with proportions and silhouettes. “Big top, little pants; or big pants, little top,” as the TikTok saying goes. Boy shorts and giant faux fur coat? Why not. Cutoffs and a trench? Let’s do it.

The Frankie Shop Astoria Cutout Trench Coat

Leset Kelly Crop Slip Fit

Agolde Indra Distressed Denim Shorts

COS Classic Leather Belt

Resort Ready

Truthfully, I’m not sure if the world has ever been the same since Hailey, Kendall Jenner, and Gigi Hadid stepped out in their best vacationwear for a girls’ night a few summers ago. Although her bold spotted dress isn’t available, you can still channel the same vibe with this beaded-strap dress from Staud.

BaubleBar Bubble Initial Necklace

Asta Resort Gisele Mini Dress

Bottega Veneta The Pouch Leather Clutch

Dolce Vita Brevel Kitten Heel Flip Flop

Polo and Leather

In another layered outfit that’s perfect for spring weather, Hailey toyed with two of the hottest current trends: polos and leather bombers. I love trend stacking! Not pictured here is the adorable Miu Miu top handle that completed the look.

Guest in Residence Collegiate Stripe Polo

RE/DONE ]Loose Long Jeans

Now 25% Off

Banana Republic Oversized Leather Bomber

Madewell The Dimes Kitten-Heel Boot

Uniform Chic

Raise your hand if you wore a uniform to school. The implicit ease of a dress code is something you can only really understand if you’ve lived it. Now that I’ve graduated from the classroom to the office, I know that finding a basic outfit equation that works for you is the biggest game-changer come Monday morning.

Aritzia Plush Cashmere Oversized V-Neck Sweater

Aritzia Olive Mini Skirt

Tory Burch Classic Lug Loafer

Mango Handmade Oversized Wool Coat

Now 35% Off

Sequin Glam

And here we have the dress that launched 1,000 dupes. Although the exact 16Arlington dress she wore is no longer available, Reformation has a very cute mini dress with a strikingly similar look. I have this frock in my closet and my favorite part is the open back, obviously.

Reformation Sereia Dress

Larroudé Vivi Lucite Hi Mule

Now 50% Off

Nood Starter Kit

Uncommon James Vintage Rings, Set of 5

Simply Strapless

Another day, another Saint Laurent look from Hailey. This one is so understated and minimal that it allows her natural beauty to take center stage. Sometimes, less really is more.

Lana Blake Lariat Necklace

Norma Kamali Bias Strapless Gown

Skims Strapless Shortie Bodysuit

Raye Kamala Heel

Jeans and Adidas

Stars are just like us; they live in jeans and sneakers, too. Snag her exact Levi’s from Amazon, or substitute with your favorite pair.

Eterne Short Sleeve Baby Tee

Citizens of Humanity Winslow Mid-Rise Straight Jeans

Adidas Samba OG

The Garment Brooklyn Jacket

Asymmetric Silk

This Phoebe Philo dress belongs in a museum. Sadly, it’s not available for purchase right now, but I adore the Courrèges alternative below, regardless of whether you’re expecting. This exclusive dress from Bloomingdale’s is another great option with a billowing A-line cut that clocks in under $350.

Courrèges Scarf-Neck Satin Mini Dress

Khaite Eva Leather Pumps

Saint Laurent Shade Oval Sunglasses

Dior Mini Lady Dior Bag

Bare Legs & Boots

Proportions are a theme with Hailey; did you notice? She once again opts for a substantial layer up top while showing some skin on her lower half. If my legs were that endless, I would probably do the same thing.

Favorite Daughter The Cropped Charles Trench Coat

Now 25% Off

Fleur du Mal Le Stretch Multi Fit Micro Bike Shorts

Prada Leather Boots

COS Cavatelli Clutch Bag

Sweat Set

Find me in the airport wearing this exact ensemble for my next flight. I think the accessories are what make this look. Without the Mary Janes, socks, glasses, hat, and earrings, this look is iffy at best. But with them? Effortlessly cool.

Sporty & Rich Emblem Printed Crewneck

Sporty & Rich Plaza Disco Shorts

Le Monde Béryl Black Mary Jane Ballerina Flats

Boss Cattina Wool Blend Coat

Open Back

For those playing along at home, can you guess who she’s wearing? Why, it’s Saint Laurent, of course. I understand you might lack red carpet opportunities, but there are still style lessons to be learned here. For one, don’t underestimate subtlety. We’ve all seen hundreds of silky champagne-colored dresses, but key elements like the open back and fun trim transform the look.

Rat & Boa Lorela Dress

Manito Diva Feather Trimmed Long Robe

Commando The Essential Sheer Tights

Dorsey Gwen Lab White Sapphire Drop Earrings

Cool Leather

This is the third outfit in which Hailey wore a leather bomber, so I’m concluding that the outerwear style is one of her go-to’s. As she’s shown us, a classic black one works just as well with jeans as it does with an LBD.

Saint Laurent Leather Jacket

Eterne Iris Mini Dress

Saint Laurent Regine Pumps

Sheertex Mini Dot Sheer Rip-Resist Tights

Now 94% Off

Why Trust ELLE

We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
